readable.title: 942399470_6132d3e5d2
readable.content: A bearded man is sitting on a bench wearing a fur lined jacket and hat . A bearded man with animal hide coat and hat . A long-bearded man wearing a coat , fur vest , and broad brimmed fur-trimmed hat . Man wearing animal skins sitting on a green bench . The man with a long beard and moustache , wearing a hat , sits outside .
